short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly toggle browser page zoom between two levels

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to toggle 3 pre-defined page zoom levels with one mouse click: just click on the extension's icon (ðŸ”Ž).

No more fumbling in the browser's settings page.

Additionally, you can set the 3 zoom levels in the right click menu: just right-click the extension icon, and choose "Extension Options".
